title: Request a Loan Against Policy Cash Value
description: A whole life policyholder wants to take a loan against the cash value of their policy.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and verify their identity.
Determine the available cash value and the maximum loan amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the maximum amount the customer can borrow against their policy.

tasks.description: Explain the terms of the loan, including the interest rate, and process the loan request.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains the loan terms and successfully processes the disbursement of funds.
